item.title: BEFORE THE DAY AFTER gal. P37 LIEGE
item.description:
BEFORE THE DAY AFTER

Charlotte Beaudry, Julien Daffe, Dialogist-Kantor, Djos Janssens, Annick Nolle, Benyamin Perry, Olivier Stevenart

OPENING FRIDAY 18 /09 2020 - 19.00
EXHIBITION 18/09 > 21/11 SAT & SUN - 15.00 > 18.00 OR BY APPOINTMENT

P37 GALLERY Rue Pierreuse 37 B 4000 Liege djos.janssens@gmail.com T +32 475 421 660 chapeau20100@gmail.com T +32 497 167 916


“petites selles d’appartement” DK 2020
